subject: Rank Math's Black Friday Sale is Live, Wp!
preview: Hey Wp! I hope you are doing well & ready to celebrate this Black Friday as an SEO in style. 🎉 With $4,000+ USD in bonuses, double the number of keywords to track, free Content AI credits & more -

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hey Wp!

I hope you are doing well & ready to celebrate this Black Friday as an SEO in style. 🎉

With $4,000+ USD in bonuses, double the number of keywords to track, free Content AI credits & more - this limited-time offer isn't one to miss. Meaning that if you upgrade to the Rank Math plan of your choice (PRO, Business, or Agency) - you'll get:

  • Unbeaten advantage over your competitors
  • Keyword Rank Tracking
  • The Most Advanced Schema Generator
  • Built-in Actionable Stats from Google
  • News/Video/Image Sitemap and SEO
  • Track top 5 winning & losing posts and keywords
  • Access to Rank Math's Content AI
  • Automated SEO email reporting
  • 30-day no questions asked money-back guarantee
  • And more…

>> Click HERE to grab our exclusive Black Friday offer
backed by our 30-day no questions asked, money-back guarantee

All in addition to bonuses offered in partnership with incredible companies including MyThemeShop, Cloudways, WP Rocket, SurferSEO, LifterLMS, Sitebulb, SEOtesting & more...

So you can complete your SEO toolkit with the same tools used by industry-leading professionals that are actually in the trenches day in and day out helping people and businesses across the globe drive more organic traffic.

>> Click HERE to grab our exclusive Black Friday offer.
backed by our 30-day no questions asked, money-back guarantee

This is a limited-time offer that will expire soon. And, we know there are tons of Black Friday deals going around - which is why we're letting you know now already that if you upgrade to a Rank Math PRO, Business, or Agency plan of your choice today, your plan's limits (number of supported websites & tracked keywords are higher) and you'll get access to free content AI credits along with $4,000+ USD worth of bonuses.

If you have any other questions about getting started or need help, feel free to hit reply to this email and I'll get back to you right away.

Take care & talk soon,
Bhanu Ahluwalia

P.S. I'm not recommending Rank Math just as a founder but as an actual user too. The secret of our success is your success. And our entire team wholeheartedly invested in the development of Rank Math to continue giving you all the tools you need to get a competitive edge. Don't hold back today. Once this offer is gone, it won't be making a return.

Don't want to receive these emails or any future plugin updates? Unsubscribe here
Rank Math Ventures LLP, EC-320, G-8, Area Rajouri Garden, Maya Enclave, Hari Nagar, New Delhi, IN - 110064
